item.title: Virtual Reality Language Immersion: Lessons from Training 200+ VR Instructors
item.description: Virtual Reality Language Immersion: Lessons from Training 200+ VR Instructors Over the past three years, I’ve had the privilege of training over 200 instructors in VR-based language pedagogy. What started as an experimental program has evolved into a comprehensive methodology for creating authentic language immersion experiences in virtual spaces. The Promise and the Challenge Virtual Reality offers something traditional classrooms can’t: instant transportation to any context where the target language is naturally used.
